That’s how we build this challenging marketplace in Miami, you will Lovvett.

LET'S START A PROJECT TOGETHER

Lovvett is a world-scale Digital Marketplace for the food industry with an innovative business model in the United States.

The startup Lovvett, based in Miami United States, was looking for ideas and development to build a MVP for his innovative Marketplace. They quickly realized that Blink was the perfect fit.

After meeting with the Lovvett Team in Miami, we came to understand the need to design a customer journey backed by a robust, consumer-oriented global platform.

BLINK WAS THEN TASKED WITH CREATING A WORLD CLASS PLATFORM INCLUDING AMONG OTHER THINGS:

1
BRANDING

Branding Design and communication Strategy

2
MICRO SERVICES

Develop and deploy the microservices oriented backend systems for the MVP and then scale it for prodcution.

3
INFRASTRUCURE

Develop and set up the devops infrastructure to support the devops cycles

4
WEBSITE

Develop the Website for Stores and consumres

5
APP

Develop the Apps for Consumers

6
INSIGHTS

Develop and set up the tools to Gain Deep Insights about consumers

7
PERSONALITATION

Build the infrestructure for Intelligent Personalization

8
OMNI CHANNEL

Build and set up tools for Omni-Channel Engagement

9
CONSUMER PROGRAM

Develop and set up the Loyalty Program, Consumer Reference program, Coupons and discounts.

10
ANALYTICS

Metrics Everywhere

MOBILE CAMP

To meet this challenging objective, Blink called together the leaders of each studio who, alongside the client, reached an agreement on the first configuration for the mobile camp.

The lovvett mobile camp was born, including people from the visual design studio, innovation studio, enterprise performance studio and devops studio.

BRANDING VISUAL DESIGN STUDIO
1

The best designs instill confidence in your product and brand. They inspire users to download, engage, and evangelize. Our digitally native designers create uniquely beautiful and functional work grounded in results-oriented best practices.

Lovvett is connection, it is sharing, it is love for what we do and consume, it is social responsibility and the understanding that if we are connected, we can achieve greater things.

According to these precepts, we develop the entire brand. Side by side with the founders, we polished the concept, the general spirit and its universe, and. First we captured in the brand and then transferred it to the mobile application.

A simple but forceful message, a close tone and vibrant colors, an interface that invites navigation in a playful way.

MICROSERVICES SOFTWARE DEVELOPMENT STUDIO
2

Based on the prooven blink accelarator architecture, we develop and deploy cloud microservices to support high scalabilit.

WHAT THEY SAID ABOUT US
RAFAEL GARRIDO
CEO & FOUNDER

"Blink's team has been of vital importance in creating the technological platform that supports a complete digital marketplace with an innovative business model in the United States, taking it from an idea to an MVP and from there to a flexible and scalable cutting-edge. They have covered from the design of the architecture, the development of all the front-end and back-end systems of the company, to the deployment and operation of multi-tier and multi-platform systems, relying on the latest generation of technological paradigms and infrastructures.

"Blink has managed to create a visual and verbal identity for Lovvett that perfectly corresponds to the values of the strong, modern and casual brand that we want to project. We often get compliments on our logo or our colorful personality. They have definitely exceeded my expectations"

MONICA GUZMÁN
CMO & FOUNDER
